titles.title: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006
A bill to protect the second amendment rights of individuals to carry firearms in units of the National Park System.
National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: National Park Second Amendment Restoration and Personal Protection Act of 2006 - Permits the possession or carrying of firearms in units of the National Park System.
